levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP, Muelsyse and her Flowing Shapes gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK, if Flowing Shape is in Melee form, pulls surrounding enemies <@ba.vup>slightly</> towards it every <@ba.vup>{mlyss_s_3[token_melee_trigger].interval}</> seconds and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> all blocked enemies; if Flowing Shape is in Ranged form, respawns all Flowing Shapes and attacks <$ba.root>Bind</> enemies for <@ba.vup>{mlyss_s_3[unmoveable].duration}</> seconds
